trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Fredericksburg
There was one other sighting in Fredericksburg on or around June 25th 2012
Summary: dark butterfly shaped main silhouette, lighter chevron-like inner shape. 7 main lights
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in the car and i heard a "tshhhhhhhhhhhhhhh" kind of noise. when i looked up toward the sky there was what i originally thought to be an airplane flying really low. when my eyes adjusted to the dark i noticed it wasnt an airplane. i had scrambled for my phone to take a picture but when i looked up and blinked it was there for a split second then 'blinked out' like it was never there to begin with. the craft\object was far down enough that i could see what looked like to be windows on the side of a stubby butterfly shaped thing. there were 7 main lights on the bottom of the object and several smaller lights on the sides. what would have been the wings of the butterfly shape were dark almost black, the v-shaped middle piece was a light, almost silver color, and what i interpreted as a door, shaped like a triangle at the inside of the v. the attatched sketch is from a more underside view.
